meanings.sent1: The nonabsorbable material stayed unchanged on the surface.
meanings.sent2: The nonabsorbable fabric repelled all liquids.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorbable sponge just sat there, refusing to soak up anything.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a nonabsorbable sponge, resistant to new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorbable coating on the pan made cleaning a breeze.

meanings.definition: Not able to be soaked up.
meanings.sent1: The nonabsorbable paper left ink sitting on top.
meanings.sent2: The nonabsorbable towel remained dry after the spill.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorbable sponge acted like a shield against liquids.
meanings.sent4: His nonabsorbable memory seemed to repel new information.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorbable soil caused puddles to form on the surface.

meanings.definition: Unable to be taken in or assimilated.
meanings.sent1: The nonabsorbable nutrients passed through the body undigested.
meanings.sent2: The nonabsorbable knowledge seemed to bounce off her mind.
meanings.sent3: The nonabsorbable facts just floated around him, never sinking in.
meanings.sent4: Her nonabsorbable emotions created a barrier to understanding.
meanings.sent5: The nonabsorbable language was like a foreign code to him.
